txt.en: 'So much lumber was stolen when those horrid thieves attacked! If I do not get it back, I will not be able to deliver the full shipment to Galtrev.\n\n'Please, help me recover the stolen wood-stacks, [placeholder]. I am very afraid of the punishment the Overseers have in store for me.'
'Ah, you have recovered all of the missing lumber! Thank you, [placeholder]. You are a true friend!'
'What can we do against those reckless, murderous brigands?'
Many pieces of lumber were stolen when the Dragon-clan thieves attacked the waggon with Galtrev's shipment.
Stolen stacks of wood can be found around the Galtrev Lumber-camp, just north of Galtrev.\n\nYou should gather wood as you investigate the Dragon-clan thieves in the Galtrev Lumber-camp.
Bring the recovered wood-stacks to Fraid
Fraid can be found at the broken waggon near the Galtrev Lumber-camp in Pren Gwydh.\n\nYou should bring the wood you recovered from the Galtrev Lumber-camp to Fraid.
